user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an email to me (mary.thompson@summitenterprises.com) offering advice on workplace spirituality at Summit Enterprises and remind him to consult his Notion for relevant insights.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Guidance on Workplace Spirituality

Dear Reverend Harrison,

I hope you’re doing well. Mary Thompson asked me to reach out and kindly request that you email her (mary.thompson@summitenterprises.com) with your insights and advice on fostering spirituality in the workplace at Summit Enterprises. She would greatly appreciate your perspective.

Mary also mentioned that you may have relevant notes in your Notion workspace; she’d be grateful if you could consult those resources while preparing your guidance.

Thank you very much for your time and support.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]

final_output:

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
